p: The findings of the present study showed that the volatile oil of CG had a protective effect on liver fibrosis in a rat model. The effects of the volatile oil of CG might be due to the terpenoid, citronellol, which was found to be the main component on GC-MS. Jiang et al. reported that citronella microemulsion gel had an antimicrobial effect in the treatment of Staphylococcus aureus and Candida albicans [ 23]. Shi et al. reported that citronellol significantly inhibited the growth and toxin production of Aspergillus flavus [ 24].
